original_text: Of a foreigner you may exact it, but whatever of yours is with your brother your hand shall release.
korean_text: 이방인에게는 네가 독촉하려니와 네 형제에게 꾸어준 것은 네 손에서 면제하라

sentences.original_text: Of a foreigner you may exact it
but whatever of yours is with your brother
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 네 동족에게 있는 네 모든 것은
